request.description: Gets all known X500 identities from the network map cache.
Gets all known X500 peer identities from the network map cache.
Gets the local node's X500 identity.
Gets the help documentation.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/{externalId} endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/count endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/hash endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/issue endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/amend endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/cancel endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/{externalId} endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/count endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/hash endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/accept endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/reject endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the nodes/all endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the nodes/peers endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the nodes/local endpoint.
Performs a vault query for invoice states.
Performs a vault query for the latest invoice state by externalId.
Performs a vault query to count the total number of unconsumed invoice states.
Performs a vault query to get the last known invoice state hash.
Issues a collection of invoice states to the network.

request.description: Cancels a collection of invoice states on the network.
Performs a vault query for funding response states.
Performs a vault query for the latest funding response state by externalId.
Performs a vault query to count the total number of unconsumed funding response states.
Performs a vault query to get the last known funding response state hash.
Accepts an existing funding response.

body.raw:
{
  "externalId": "FUNDING_RESPONSE_1",
  "bankAccount": {
    "accountName": "Mr. A. N. Other",
    "accountNumber": "12345678",
    "sortCode": "10-20-30",
    "bankIdentifierCode": "DABAAZ01",
    "internationalBankAccountNumber": "AZ 01 DABA012345 12345678",
    "abaNumber": "01010101",
    "bankName": "Bank of Breakfast Tea",
    "bankAddress": {
      "residenceNameOrNumber": "Bank of England",
      "unitNameOrNumber": null,
      "street": "Threadneedle Street",
      "locality": null,
      "municipality": "London",
      "province": "City of London",
      "country": "United Kingdom",
      "postalCode": "EC2R 8AH"
    }
  }
}

request.description: Rejects an existing funding response.
Gets all known X500 identities from the network map cache.
Gets all known X500 peer identities from the network map cache.
Gets the local node's X500 identity.
Gets the help documentation.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/{externalId} endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/count endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/hash endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the invoices/transfer endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/{externalId} endpoint.

Gets the help documentation for the fundingresponses/issue endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the nodes/all endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the nodes/peers endpoint.
Gets the help documentation for the nodes/local endpoint.
Performs a vault query for invoice states.
Performs a vault query for the latest invoice state by externalId.
Performs a vault query to count the total number of unconsumed invoice states.
Performs a vault query to get the last known invoice state hash.
Transfers a collection of invoice states on the network.
Performs a vault query for funding response states.
Performs a vault query for the latest funding response state by externalId.
Performs a vault query to count the total number of unconsumed funding response states.
Performs a vault query to get the last known funding response state hash.
Creates a new funding response.
